rules.natural: If the artwork exhibit needs water, then it gets water.
Either the artwork exhibit needs water, or there is a food distribution event this weekend.
Provided that a nutrition workshop is scheduled for tomorrow, the vegetable bed is ready to harvest or the herb garden is ready to harvest.
Under the condition that a school group is visiting in the morning, a cooking demonstration is scheduled for today.
If a school group is visiting in the afternoon, then a nutrition workshop is scheduled for tomorrow.
Whenever the weather is good today, the farm is not closed to the public.
Provided that the weather is good tomorrow, the farm is not closed to the public.
If the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, then under the condition that the artwork exhibit needs water, it does not get water.
If the herb garden is ready to harvest, then whenever the artwork exhibit needs water, it does not get water.
The fruit trees need pruning, or the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, or the herb garden is ready to harvest.
Volunteers are available for the morning shift or volunteers are available for the evening shift.
Under the condition that volunteers are available for the evening shift, the herb garden is ready to harvest.
If a cooking demonstration is scheduled for today, then the vegetable bed is ready to harvest or the herb garden is ready to harvest.
If it is not the case that a school group is visiting in the morning or a school group is visiting in the afternoon, then the farm is closed to the public.
Whenever it is not the case that the weather is good today or the weather is good tomorrow, only indoor activities are scheduled.
If it is not the case that volunteers being available for the morning shift implies the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, then the coordinator intervenes with the watering schedule.

facts.natural: It is not the case that only indoor activities are scheduled.
The fruit trees do not need pruning.
The coordinator does not intervene with the watering schedule.

target.natural: There is a food distribution event this weekend.

(A1 → A2).natural: If the artwork exhibit needs water, then it gets water.

(A1 → ¬A2).natural: Whenever the artwork exhibit needs water, it does not get water.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the artwork exhibit needs water, or there is a food distribution event this weekend.

(A10 → (A3 ∨ A4)).natural: Provided that a nutrition workshop is scheduled for tomorrow, the vegetable bed is ready to harvest or the herb garden is ready to harvest.

(A11 → A9).natural: Under the condition that a school group is visiting in the morning, a cooking demonstration is scheduled for today.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: A school group is visiting in the morning or a school group is visiting in the afternoon.

(A12 → A10).natural: If a school group is visiting in the afternoon, then a nutrition workshop is scheduled for tomorrow.

(A14 → ¬A13).natural: Whenever the weather is good today, the farm is not closed to the public.

(A14 ∨ A15).natural: The weather is good today or the weather is good tomorrow.

(A15 → ¬A13).natural: Provided that the weather is good tomorrow, the farm is not closed to the public.

(A3 → (A1 → ¬A2)).natural: If the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, then under the condition that the artwork exhibit needs water, it does not get water.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, or the herb garden is ready to harvest.

(A4 → (A1 → ¬A2)).natural: If the herb garden is ready to harvest, then whenever the artwork exhibit needs water, it does not get water.

(A5 ∨ (A3 ∨ A4)).natural: The fruit trees need pruning, or the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, or the herb garden is ready to harvest.

(A6 → A3).natural: Whenever volunteers are available for the morning shift, the vegetable bed is ready to harvest.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: Volunteers are available for the morning shift or volunteers are available for the evening shift.

(A7 → A4).natural: Under the condition that volunteers are available for the evening shift, the herb garden is ready to harvest.

(A9 → (A3 ∨ A4)).natural: If a cooking demonstration is scheduled for today, then the vegetable bed is ready to harvest or the herb garden is ready to harvest.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: A cooking demonstration is scheduled for today or a nutrition workshop is scheduled for tomorrow.

(¬(A11 ∨ A12) → A13).natural: If it is not the case that a school group is visiting in the morning or a school group is visiting in the afternoon, then the farm is closed to the public.

(¬(A14 ∨ A15) → A16).natural: Whenever it is not the case that the weather is good today or the weather is good tomorrow, only indoor activities are scheduled.

(¬(A6 → A3) → A8).natural: If it is not the case that volunteers being available for the morning shift implies the vegetable bed is ready to harvest, then the coordinator intervenes with the watering schedule.
